mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.revoke.repository.RevokeMapper.selectRevokeDetail */ select em.bill_kind --안건종류 , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb -- 사회토론번호 , em.reg_dt -- 등록날짜 , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg,em.bill_name_ru,em.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.ppsr_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg,em.etc_ru,em.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc -- 비고 , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.wt_cn_kg,em.wt_cn_ru,em.wt_cn_kg,#{lang}) as wt_cn -- 철회사유 from kgst.ebs_master em left join kgst.view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.member_id ) where em.bill_id = #{billId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.revoke.repository.RevokeMapper.selectProposerList */ select ep.proposer_id -- 제안자 대상 , case when (ep.sign_dt is not null and ep.sign_cnc_dt is null) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agreeYn -- 동의여부 , view.member_nm_kg -- 의원이름kg , view.member_nm_ru -- 의원이름ru , view.poly_nm -- 정당이름 , view.poly_cd -- 정당코드 from ebs_proposer ep left join kgst.view_user_member view on view.member_id = ep.proposer_id where ep.bill_id = #{billId} and (sign_dt is not null and sign_cnc_dt is null)
mapper.update: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.revoke.repository.RevokeMapper.updateRevoke */ update kgst.ebs_master set mod_id = #{loginId} -- 수정자 아이디 , mod_dt = now() -- 수정날짜 , wt_cn_kg = #{wtCnKg} -- 철회사유kg , wt_cn_ru = #{wtCnRu} -- 철회사유ru where bill_id = #{billId}
